verses.verse: Then sang <S%H7891><s%> <S%H8799><s%> Mosheh <S%H4872><s%> and the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> this song <S%H7892><s%> unto the YY <S%H3068><s%>, and spake <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, I will sing <S%H7891><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto the YY <S%H3068><s%>, for he hath triumphed <S%H1342><s%> <S%H8804><s%> gloriously <S%H1342><s%> <S%H8800><s%>: the horse <S%H5483><s%> and his rider <S%H7392><s%> <S%H8802><s%> hath he thrown <S%H7411><s%> <S%H8804><s%> into the sea <S%H3220><s%>.

The YY <S%H3050><s%> is my strength <S%H5797><s%> and song <S%H2176><s%>, and he is become my salvation <S%H3444><s%>: he <S%H2088><s%> is my 'Elohim <S%H410><s%>, and I will prepare him an habitation <S%H5115><s%> <S%H8686><s%>; my father's <S%H1><s%> 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>, and I will exalt <S%H7311><s%> <S%H8787><s%> him.
The YY <S%H3068><s%> is a man <S%H376><s%> of war <S%H4421><s%>: the YY <S%H3068><s%> is his name <S%H8034><s%>.

Pharaoh's <S%H6547><s%> chariots <S%H4818><s%> and his host <S%H2428><s%> hath he cast <S%H3384><s%> <S%H8804><s%> into the sea <S%H3220><s%>: his chosen <S%H4005><s%> captains <S%H7991><s%> also are drowned <S%H2883><s%> <S%H8795><s%> in the Red <S%H5488><s%> sea <S%H3220><s%>.
The depths <S%H8415><s%> have covered <S%H3680><s%> <S%H8762><s%> them: they sank <S%H3381><s%> <S%H8804><s%> into the bottom <S%H4688><s%> as <S%H3644><s%> a stone <S%H68><s%>.

Thy right hand <S%H3225><s%>, O YY <S%H3068><s%>, is become glorious <S%H142><s%> <S%H8737><s%> in power <S%H3581><s%>: thy right hand <S%H3225><s%>, O YY <S%H3068><s%>, hath dashed in pieces <S%H7492><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the enemy <S%H341><s%> <S%H8802><s%>.

And in the greatness <S%H7230><s%> of thine excellency <S%H1347><s%> thou hast overthrown <S%H2040><s%> <S%H8799><s%> them that rose up against <S%H6965><s%> <S%H8801><s%> thee: thou sentest forth <S%H7971><s%> <S%H8762><s%> thy wrath <S%H2740><s%>, which consumed <S%H398><s%> <S%H8799><s%> them as stubble <S%H7179><s%>.

And with the blast <S%H7307><s%> of thy nostrils <S%H639><s%> the waters <S%H4325><s%> were gathered together <S%H6192><s%> <S%H8738><s%>, the floods <S%H5140><s%> <S%H8802><s%> stood upright <S%H5324><s%> <S%H8738><s%> as an heap <S%H5067><s%>, and the depths <S%H8415><s%> were congealed <S%H7087><s%> <S%H8804><s%> in the heart <S%H3820><s%> of the sea <S%H3220><s%>.

The enemy <S%H341><s%> <S%H8802><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, I will pursue <S%H7291><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, I will overtake <S%H5381><s%> <S%H8686><s%>, I will divide <S%H2505><s%> <S%H8762><s%> the spoil <S%H7998><s%>; my lust <S%H5315><s%> shall be satisfied <S%H4390><s%> <S%H8799><s%> upon them; I will draw <S%H7324><s%> <S%H8686><s%> my sword <S%H2719><s%>, my hand <S%H3027><s%> shall destroy <S%H3423><s%> <S%H8686><s%> them.

Thou didst blow <S%H5398><s%> <S%H8804><s%> with thy wind <S%H7307><s%>, the sea <S%H3220><s%> covered <S%H3680><s%> <S%H8765><s%> them: they sank <S%H6749><s%> <S%H8804><s%> as lead <S%H5777><s%> in the mighty <S%H117><s%> waters <S%H4325><s%>.

Who is like unto thee, O YY <S%H3068><s%>, among the 'elohim <S%H410><s%>? who is like thee, glorious <S%H142><s%> <S%H8737><s%> in holiness <S%H6944><s%>, fearful <S%H3372><s%> <S%H8737><s%> in praises <S%H8416><s%>, doing <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8802><s%> wonders <S%H6382><s%> ?
Thou stretchedst out <S%H5186><s%> <S%H8804><s%> thy right hand <S%H3225><s%>, the earth <S%H776><s%> swallowed <S%H1104><s%> <S%H8799><s%> them.

Thou in thy mercy <S%H2617><s%> hast led forth <S%H5148><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> which <S%H2098><s%> thou hast redeemed <S%H1350><s%> <S%H8804><s%>: thou hast guided <S%H5095><s%> <S%H8765><s%> them in thy strength <S%H5797><s%> unto thy holy <S%H6944><s%> habitation <S%H5116><s%>.

The people <S%H5971><s%> shall hear <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, and be afraid <S%H7264><s%> <S%H8799><s%>: sorrow <S%H2427><s%> shall take hold <S%H270><s%> <S%H8804><s%> on the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8802><s%> of Palestina <S%H6429><s%>.

Then <S%H227><s%> the dukes <S%H441><s%> of Edom <S%H123><s%> shall be amazed <S%H926><s%> <S%H8738><s%>; the mighty men <S%H352><s%> of Moab <S%H4124><s%>, trembling <S%H7461><s%> shall take hold <S%H270><s%> <S%H8799><s%> upon them; all the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8802><s%> of Kanahan <S%H3667><s%> shall melt away <S%H4127><s%> <S%H8738><s%>.

Fear <S%H367><s%> and dread <S%H6343><s%> shall fall <S%H5307><s%> <S%H8799><s%> upon them; by the greatness <S%H1419><s%> of thine arm <S%H2220><s%> they shall be as still <S%H1826><s%> <S%H8799><s%> as a stone <S%H68><s%>; till thy people <S%H5971><s%> pass over <S%H5674><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, O YY <S%H3068><s%>, till the people <S%H5971><s%> pass over <S%H5674><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, which <S%H2098><s%> thou hast purchased <S%H7069><s%> <S%H8804><s%>.

Thou shalt bring <S%H935><s%> <S%H8686><s%> them in, and plant <S%H5193><s%> <S%H8799><s%> them in the mountain <S%H2022><s%> of thine inheritance <S%H5159><s%>, in the place <S%H4349><s%>, O YY <S%H3068><s%>, which thou hast made <S%H6466><s%> <S%H8804><s%> for thee to dwell in <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, in the Sanctuary <S%H4720><s%>, O YY <S%H136><s%>, which thy hands <S%H3027><s%> have established <S%H3559><s%> <S%H8790><s%>.
The YY <S%H3068><s%> shall reign <S%H4427><s%> <S%H8799><s%> for ever <S%H5769><s%> and ever <S%H5703><s%>.

For the horse <S%H5483><s%> of Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> went in <S%H935><s%> <S%H8804><s%> with his chariots <S%H7393><s%> and with his horsemen <S%H6571><s%> into the sea <S%H3220><s%>, and the YY <S%H3068><s%> brought again <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8686><s%> the waters <S%H4325><s%> of the sea <S%H3220><s%> upon them; but the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> went <S%H1980><s%> <S%H8804><s%> on dry <S%H3004><s%> land in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the sea <S%H3220><s%>.

And Miryam <S%H4813><s%> the prophetess <S%H5031><s%>, the sister <S%H269><s%> of Aharon <S%H175><s%>, took <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8799><s%> a timbrel <S%H8596><s%> in her hand <S%H3027><s%>; and all the women <S%H802><s%> went out <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8799><s%> after <S%H310><s%> her with timbrels <S%H8596><s%> and with dances <S%H4246><s%>.

And Miryam <S%H4813><s%> answered <S%H6030><s%> <S%H8799><s%> them, Sing <S%H7891><s%> <S%H8798><s%> ye to the YY <S%H3068><s%>, for he hath triumphed <S%H1342><s%> <S%H8804><s%> gloriously <S%H1342><s%> <S%H8800><s%>; the horse <S%H5483><s%> and his rider <S%H7392><s%> <S%H8802><s%> hath he thrown <S%H7411><s%> <S%H8804><s%> into the sea <S%H3220><s%>.

So Mosheh <S%H4872><s%> brought <S%H5265><s%> <S%H8686><s%> Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> from the Red <S%H5488><s%> sea <S%H3220><s%>, and they went out <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8799><s%> into the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> of Shur <S%H7793><s%>; and they went <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8799><s%> three <S%H7969><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%>, and found <S%H4672><s%> <S%H8804><s%> no water <S%H4325><s%>.

And when they came <S%H935><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to Marah <S%H4785><s%>, they could <S%H3201><s%> <S%H8804><s%> not drink <S%H8354><s%> <S%H8800><s%> of the waters <S%H4325><s%> of Marah <S%H4785><s%>, for they were bitter <S%H4751><s%>: therefore the name <S%H8034><s%> of it was called <S%H7121><s%> <S%H8804><s%> Marah <S%H4785><s%>.
And the people <S%H5971><s%> murmured <S%H3885><s%> <S%H8735><s%> against Mosheh <S%H4872><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, What shall we drink <S%H8354><s%> <S%H8799><s%> ?

And he cried <S%H6817><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto the YY <S%H3068><s%>; and the YY <S%H3068><s%> shewed <S%H3384><s%> <S%H8686><s%> him a tree <S%H6086><s%>, which when he had cast <S%H7993><s%> <S%H8686><s%> into the waters <S%H4325><s%>, the waters <S%H4325><s%> were made sweet <S%H4985><s%> <S%H8799><s%>: there he made <S%H7760><s%> <S%H8804><s%> for them a statute <S%H2706><s%> and an ordinance <S%H4941><s%>, and there he proved <S%H5254><s%> <S%H8765><s%> them,

And said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, If thou wilt diligently <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8800><s%> hearken <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to the voice <S%H6963><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> thy 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>, and wilt do <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8799><s%> that which is right <S%H3477><s%> in his sight <S%H5869><s%>, and wilt give ear <S%H238><s%> <S%H8689><s%> to his Mitzvot <S%H4687><s%>, and keep <S%H8104><s%> <S%H8804><s%> all his statutes <S%H2706><s%>, I will put <S%H7760><s%> <S%H8799><s%> none of these diseases <S%H4245><s%> upon thee, which I have brought <S%H7760><s%> <S%H8804><s%> upon the Egyptians <S%H4714><s%>: for I am the YY <S%H3068><s%> that healeth <S%H7495><s%> <S%H8802><s%> thee.

And they came <S%H935><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to Elim <S%H362><s%>, where were twelve <S%H8147><s%> <S%H6240><s%> wells <S%H5869><s%> of water <S%H4325><s%>, and threescore and ten <S%H7657><s%> palm trees <S%H8558><s%>: and they encamped <S%H2583><s%> <S%H8799><s%> there by the waters <S%H4325><s%>.
